Feats-Skill-Medicine -- Female Half-Elf Ranger: 2
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)

Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Favored Terrain (Sky): Moves normally through difficult terrain in the sky/Has a 25' fly Speed
Favored Terrain (Swamp): Moves normally over greater difficult terrain caused by bogs

Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 7 from any)
Battle Medicine: (1) Can use Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Continual Recovery: Can repeat Treat Wounds on a patient after 10 min
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Hunt Prey: (1) Gives +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track a designated creature until next daily prep
Legendary Medic: Can use a 1 hr process and a successful Medicine check to remove a disease or condition once per target per day
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with hunted prey
Robust Recovery: Success on Treat a Disease or a Poison gives a +4 bonus, and patient successes are critical successes
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Ward Medic: Can use Medicine to Treat Disease or Treat Wounds on up to 2 creatures simultaneously

Outwit: +1 Armor Class vs. hunted prey
